import re

# Read the input file
with open("temp_preprocess/to_correct_de2125a6-ad4d-444f-a712-f04f71fe648b.md", "r") as f:
    content = f.read()

# Correct heading hierarchy
content = re.sub(r"^(#+)\s*(.+)", lambda match: "#" * (len(match.group(1)) % 7 or 7) + " " + match.group(2), content, flags=re.MULTILINE)

# Fix character-level extraction errors
content = re.sub(r"([a-z])([A-Z])", lambda match: match.group(1) + " " + match.group(2).lower(), content)
content = re.sub(r"([A-Z])([A-Z][a-z])", lambda match: match.group(1) + " " + match.group(2), content)

# Preserve and clarify structure
content = re.sub(r"\n\n+", "\n\n", content)  # Ensure proper paragraph separation
content = re.sub(r"(!\[.*?\]\(.*?\))\n", r"\1 ", content)  # Keep figure captions on the same line
content = re.sub(r"(\$\$.*?\$\$)\n", r"\1 ", content)  # Keep equations on the same line
content = re.sub(r"\n(\[@.*?\])", r" \1", content)  # Keep citation markers on the same line

# Write the corrected content to the output file
with open("temp_preprocess/corrected_de2125a6-ad4d-444f-a712-f04f71fe648b.md", "w") as f:
    f.write(content)
